page.title: 09A Day In The Life Of Adam.
page.content: I got up at 7:45 and had breakfast etc. At 8:40 I set off for the hospital and saw the doctor at 9:30. At 10:20 I arrived back at school, half-way through English Lit. Break was at 10:40. Next lesson was English. 12:00 ,dinner time. Had salad, then choclate sponge. Got out of lunch at 12:25. 1.15, Bell goes for next lesson Our class go out on a walk for the Doomsday Project. We went across the golf course, then along the crags, noting areas of woodland etc.Then we cut across the playing fields. I went home early and arrived at 3:20. Watched Wimbledon on T.V. At 3:35 My mum got home, she'd been playing tennis with my sister who was off school because of the teachers strike. 5:00, I had tea and set off for Band at Langsett Music Centre at 5:15.
